actions.description: The thri-kreen makes two Gythka attacks or four Psychic Bolt attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d8 + 1) slashing damage.
actions.name: Gythka

actions.description: 6 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) psychic damage.
actions.name: Psychic Bolt

actions.description: The thri-kreen targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 32 (5d12) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The thri-kreen regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.
actions.name: Drain Vitality (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

actions.description:
The thri-kreen casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:
At will: levitate (self only), mage hand (the hand is invisible)

1/day each: freedom of movement (self only), invisibility (self only)
actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
